GSD.description:
f2fs: remove WARN_ON in f2fs_is_valid_blkaddr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 8c62c5e26345c34d199b4b8c8e69255ba3d0e751. For more details please see the references link.
